text: Richard Backus (born March 28, 1945) is an American actor and television writer. He has been nominated for four Daytime Emmy Awards for writing and one for acting.New York Times ==Partial filmography== *Deathdream (1974) - 'Andy' / Andy Brooks *The First Deadly Sin (1980) - Walt Ashman ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Writers from New Hampshire
title: Richard Backus
